name: Wizards of Catastrophe
description:
Wizards of Catastrophe - WizCats Introductory Notes
  • This is a simple but challenging memory game.
  • The general goal is to remember the location of the green, yellow and  blue zombies.
  • The ultimate goal is to reach a score of 500, which might be  impossible.
  • Please note that the game has not been optimized for mobile devices. 
Game Engine
  • Game developed using GDevelop.
Image Credits
  • Ant icon made by Smashicons from www.flaticon.com
  • Apple, orange and lemon icons made by Icongeek26 from www.flaticon.com
  • Blackboard icon made by photo3idea_studio from www.flaticon.com
  • Home icon made by Freepik from www.flaticon.com
  • Snake, Goat, Parrot, and Cube icons by www.kenney.nl
  • Bushes adapted from icons made by Freepik from www.flaticon.com
  • Zombies adapted from sprites provided by www.gameart2d.com
  • Background sand image created by rawpixel.com - www.freepik.com
  • Background galaxy image created by  Vectorium - www.freepik.com
Sound Credits
  • Chewing sound: "Chewing, Carrot, A.wav" by InspectorJ (www.jshaw.co.uk) of Freesound.org
  • Goat sound by poodaddy69 of Freesound.org
  • Bird sound by Mings of Freesound.org
  • Snake sound by 7h3_lark of Freesound.org
